timeline.message: query_breakdown locationtracker now works with replacement
stack now works to rearrange output order
test case for deletion and replacement at the same time added
json flag added as well as variable programmed
works as a stand-alone jar file now
integration is now finished and working!
code cleaned up for pull request

timeline.bodyText: Seems , PATH should not be here?
timeline.author: feiling
feiling

timeline.bodyText: You should be able to simplify this by using a library like Jackson (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jackson_(API)). You can choose to do that in a future PR.
timeline.author: feiling

replies.bodyText: Got it, yup. Right now I might still add more to the JSON schema so I will address this in a future PR!
replies.author: subinbean

replies.bodyText: Upon looking into it, the Jackson API is not too good for the current use case since we are only selecting a subset of fields from the node object instead of turning the entire object into a JSON. The org.json.simple library seems to be better I think--will use that one instead
replies.author: subinbean
